author: craigmcc
msg: Implement a "work around patch" so that you can handle more than one
<jsp:plugin> action in the same JSP page.  Previously, this caused problems
because of multiple declarations of the same temporary variables.
As the original submitter points out, this patch is not particularly elegant.
A better solution would be to generate local variable names with a unique
